summary: Chen-Ning Franklin Yang , also known as Yang Zhenning, is a Chinese-born American physicist and mathematician.
full_text: In quantum mechanics, the Byers-Yang theorem states that all physical properties of a doubly connected system  enclosing a magnetic flux  through the opening are periodic in the flux with period  . The theorem was first stated and proven by Nina Byers and Chen-Ning Yang , and further developed by Felix Bloch .
title: Byers-Yang theorem
